description:
It's not easy being Cody Cummings. Adoring fans, crushing schedule and a jam packed agenda make it hard for him to sometimes take time out for the little people in his life. Such is the case for his 'baby', home alone and forever waiting on Cody to bring his rock hard cock home for the night. Talk about cock-starved! So Cody decides to appease his baby and make a personal video after everyone has left the gym one night. Slowly undressing, flexing, pushing his cock all around, he gets up close and personal with the camera to give you an intimate look into his hard, hard life.

Enjoy!
title: Private Cam
